hero.title: The History of Armenia
hero.subtitle: A journey through one of the world's oldest civilizations

intro.title: A Land of Ancient Heritage
intro.text: Armenia is one of the oldest countries in the world, with a history that spans thousands of years. From powerful ancient kingdoms to cultural and spiritual milestones, Armenia has preserved its identity through centuries of change.

urartu.title: Kingdom of Urartu
urartu.text: Between the 9th and 6th centuries BC, the Kingdom of Urartu rose in the Armenian Highlands. It built powerful fortresses, advanced irrigation systems, and laid the foundations of Armenian statehood and culture.

christianity.title: First Christian Nation
christianity.text: In 301 AD, Armenia became the first country in the world to adopt Christianity as a state religion. This decision shaped the nation's identity, architecture, and spiritual heritage for centuries.

medieval.title: Medieval Armenia
medieval.text: During the Middle Ages, Armenia flourished as a center of culture, education, and trade. Magnificent monasteries, stone churches, and illuminated manuscripts became symbols of national resilience.

modern.title: Modern Armenia
modern.text: After centuries of challenges, Armenia regained independence in 1991. Today, it stands as a proud nation that carefully preserves its ancient traditions while moving confidently toward the future.

hero.title: Armenian Cuisine
hero.subtitle: A taste shaped by fire, mountains, and centuries of tradition.

intro.title: More Than Food
intro.text: Armenian cuisine is not just about dishes — it is about family, hospitality, and sharing. Recipes have been passed from generation to generation, preserving authentic flavors and techniques.

khorovats.title: Khorovats
khorovats.text: Traditional Armenian barbecue cooked over open flame. Juicy, smoky, and served during celebrations and gatherings.

lavash.title: Lavash
lavash.text: Thin traditional bread baked in a tonir oven. Recognized by UNESCO as intangible cultural heritage.

dolma.title: Dolma
dolma.text: Grape leaves stuffed with meat, rice, and aromatic herbs. A perfect balance of flavor and tradition.

gata.title: Gata
gata.text: Sweet layered pastry with delicate filling. A symbol of Armenian warmth and hospitality.

experience.title: Experience the Armenian Table
experience.text: A traditional Armenian table is generous and welcoming. Meals are long, conversations are warm, and guests are always treated like family.

hero.title: Armenian Culture
hero.subtitle: A heritage shaped by faith, art, music, and centuries of resilience.

dance.title: Traditional Dance & Music
dance.text: Armenian dances reflect strength, unity, and celebration. Each movement tells a story of mountains, warriors, and community spirit passed down through generations.

crafts.title: Carpets & Handicrafts
crafts.text: Handwoven carpets and traditional crafts represent symbols, stories, and regional identity. Every ornament carries meaning rooted in history.

architecture.title: Sacred Architecture
architecture.text: Ancient monasteries and stone churches define the Armenian landscape. Their minimalist yet powerful design reflects spiritual depth and timeless beauty.

art.title: Manuscripts & Fine Arts
art.text: Illuminated manuscripts and classical art preserved knowledge, faith, and identity. Armenian calligraphy and miniature painting remain cultural treasures.

hero.title: Nature of Armenia
hero.subtitle: Mountains, lakes, forests, and landscapes untouched by time.

mountains.title: Majestic Mountains
mountains.text: Armenia is a land of highlands and dramatic peaks, offering breathtaking views and unforgettable hiking experiences.

lakes.title: Crystal Lakes
lakes.text: Lake Sevan and alpine waters reflect the sky and create peaceful escapes surrounded by nature.

forests.title: Green Forests
forests.text: Dense forests provide fresh air, wildlife, and hidden trails waiting to be explored.

canyons.title: Wild Canyons
canyons.text: Deep gorges and rock formations reveal the raw beauty shaped by centuries of natural forces.

final.title: Discover Untouched Beauty
final.text: From sunrise over the mountains to sunset by the lakes, Armenia’s nature offers serenity and adventure in equal measure.

faq.custom_q1: How is the price calculated for a custom tour?
faq.custom_a1: Pricing is transparent, based on mileage, vehicle class, and duration. You receive a fixed quote within hours—no hidden fees.
faq.custom_q2: Can we change the itinerary during the trip?
faq.custom_a2: Absolutely. Flexibility is our signature. Want to stay longer at a view or skip a museum? Your driver will adapt to your flow instantly.
faq.custom_a3: Yes! We love pets. Just let us know in advance so we can provide a vehicle that ensures a comfortable ride for your furry friend.
faq.custom_q4: Do you organize multi-day trips across Armenia?
faq.custom_a4: Yes, we handle everything: logistics, boutique hotel bookings, and daily activities to ensure a seamless cross-country experience.
faq.custom_q5: What if I don't know where to go?
faq.custom_a5: Tell us your interests (hiking, wine, history, or relaxation), and our experts will design 3 unique route options for you at no cost.
faq.custom_q6: Are guides available in languages other than English?
faq.custom_a6: We provide professional guides fluent in Armenian, English, Russian, French, German, and more upon request.
faq.school_q1: Are the buses safe for group transport?
faq.school_a1: Safety is our priority. Our fleet features modern safety belts, speed limiters, and drivers with over 10 years of experience with children.
faq.school_q2: Do you provide legal documentation for schools?
faq.school_a2: We handle all the paperwork. From insurance and contracts to permits for school administrations, we make the process hassle-free.
faq.school_q3: Are there free seats for teachers?
faq.school_a3: Yes, we provide 1 complimentary seat for every 10-12 students for teachers or chaperones.
faq.school_q4: Is there an educational component to the tours?
faq.school_a4: We can align our trips with the school curriculum, making history, geography, or science come alive through interactive storytelling.
faq.school_q5: How is catering handled for school groups?
faq.school_a5: We partner with certified restaurants that specialize in child-safe catering. Menus are pre-approved and account for all allergies.
faq.school_q6: What happens in case of a medical emergency?
faq.school_a6: All drivers are trained in basic first aid, and our routes are planned with proximity to medical centers in mind for complete peace of mind.
